articles.description: Listen to 5 Live radio commentary and follow live text updates from the opening day of The Masters from Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia, USA.
articles.title: Masters 2024 LIVE: Round one leaderboard, scores, commentary and updates from Augusta

articles.description: Follow live text updates and watch 5 Live Final Score coverage from the Europa League & Europa Conference League Quarter-final first legs.
articles.title: Build-up with Liverpool, West Ham & Aston Villa in European action

articles.description: The ex-American football star was controversially acquitted of double murder of wife and friend in 1995.
articles.title: OJ Simpson, NFL star cleared in ‘trial of the century’, dies aged 76

articles.description: Fernando Alonso signs a new deal to stay with Aston Martin in Formula 1 until at least the end of 2026.
articles.title: Fernando Alonso: Aston Martin driver signs new deal until end of 2026

articles.description: The Premier League's current Profit and Sustainability Rules will remain in place next season.
articles.title: Premier League financial rules to remain next season

articles.description: Barcelona and PSG refuse to speak to a Spanish broadcaster after comments made about midfielder Lamine Yamal.
articles.title: Barca & PSG boycott TV network over Yamal remark

articles.description: As Jurgen Klopp nears the end of his tenure at Liverpool, BBC Sport visits Anfield to analyse the impact of the German on the club, the city, and discuss how the Reds will handle his impeding departure.
articles.title: 'Things will never be the same again' - Can Liverpool thrive after Klopp?

articles.description: Ruben Amorim denies reaching an agreement with Liverpool to succeed Jurgen Klopp as manager.
articles.title: Sporting's Amorim denies Liverpool agreement

articles.description: Ronda Rousey - judoka, mixed martial artist, wrestler - tells BBC Sport how she has found inner peace after coming back from the lowest point of her career.
articles.title: Ronda Rousey: How former UFC fighter found solace and inner peace

articles.description: Novak Djokovic gets revenge for his 2023 loss to Italy's Lorenzo Musetti and reaches the Monte Carlo Masters quarter-finals.
articles.title: Monte Carlo Masters: Novak Djokovic beats Lorenzo Musetti to reach quarter-finals
